title: Cryptogreatdane
author: Cryptogreatdane
created_time: June 13, 2022, 02:08:20 AMLast edit: June 13, 2022, 03:08:24 AM by Cryptogreatdane
content: Whats up forum. Thought id share with the group this artwork i commissioned from slumberjack. Its my opinion hes the number one BTC cartoonist out there. If your looking to immortalize yourself as a BTC cartoon i encourage you to reach out. Or look through his pieces that are still available. I believe these will be sought after in the future.

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on June 13, 2022, 02:08:20 AMWhats up forum. Thought id share with the group this artwork i commissioned from slumberjack. Its my opinion hes the number one BTC cartoonist out there. If your looking to immortalize yourself as a BTC cartoon i encourage you to reach out. Or look through his pieces that are still available. I believe these will be sought after in the future. Can someone make this picture bigger   I like the art is he on twitter?

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: MrMojoRising26 on June 13, 2022, 02:21:44 AMQuote from: Cryptogreatdane on June 13, 2022, 02:08:20 AMWhats up forum. Thought id share with the group this artwork i commissioned from slumberjack. Its my opinion hes the number one BTC cartoonist out there. If your looking to immortalize yourself as a BTC cartoon i encourage you to reach out. Or look through his pieces that are still available. I believe these will be sought after in the future. Can someone make this picture bigger   I like the art is he on twitter? he sells here on the forum. If you search slumberjack you can find them. He is on twitter under bitcoin cartoons. He also has a new webpage but cant remember what it is. Ill see if i can get him to comment and put up a post with his available stuff. Its really fantastic art. Super relevant to our current world. Smart, funny, creative stuff.

comments.author: slumberjack
comments.body: I like the art is he on twitter?[/quote]Hey MrMojoRising! Great name, I love The Doors!I'm on twitter @BitcoinCartoons https://twitter.com/BitcoinCartoonsMy main website is https://www.bitcoincartoons.io/. I've got a shop on there that displays all the current available toons. Just as Great Dane mentioned, I do commissions as well. Let me know what you like! Cheers.

comments.author: MrMojoRising26

I've got a shop on there that displays all the current available toons. Just as Great Dane mentioned, I do commissions as well. Let me know what you like! Cheers.[/quote]you caught the name reference right on slumberjack! I will reach out to you thanks for the info
